犺字的基本解释

犺
kàng
健壮的狗。
健壮。
刺猬。

犺
gǎng
古书上说的一种野兽，像猿猴，可驯养供驱使。

犺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kàng］
［《廣韻》苦浪切，去宕，溪。］
见“狼犺”。
[②]［gǎng］
［《集韻》舉朗切，上蕩，見。］
见“狼2犺”。

犺字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　犺； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页706第21
【唐韻】苦浪切【韻會】【正韻】口浪切，?音抗。【說文】健犬也。　又【玉篇】猬也。　又【廣韻】猰犺，不順。　又【集韻】舉朗切，音㽘。犺狼，獸名。【正字通】出暹羅之崛隴。短小精悍，目圓睛黃，木食如猿猱，古樾蒙密者，率數十巢，山居夷獠畜之，備驅使。蒙以敝絮。飮以醨酒，食以?鮍輒喜，舉族受役，至死不避。常令人山採鶴頂，象齒，犀角，皆如期而獲，輸其主。雖它姓奪之，必不與。舶人編竹爲籠。置犺所往來之逕，機取之。詳見【黃衷·海語】。

犺字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
犺字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Part Two] [Dog Character Department] 　犺; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 706 21
[Tang Yun] Bitter waves cut [Rhyme will] [Zheng Yun] mouth waves cut, sound resistance. [Said the text] The dog is also healthy.　[Jade articles] Hedgehog also.　[Guangyun] 猰犺, it's not going well.　[Jiyun] Ju Langqie, sound 㽘. The wolf, the name of the animal. 【Zhengzitong】Out of Siam's Juelong. Short and fierce, with round eyes and yellow eyes, wood eaters are like apes, ancient Yue Mongolians, rate dozens of nests, mountain dwellers of barbarians, ready to drive. Meng Yixu. To drink wine, eat to eat? For joy, the whole clan is enlisted, and will not evade to death. People often pick up crane tops, elephant teeth, and rhino horns. Although its surname is Duozhi, it will not be associated with it. Ship people weave bamboo into cages. Set the path to and from, and take it by machine. See 【Huang Zhong·Haiyu】 for details.
